2005480.name: EndoPlasmica
2005480.description: Endoplasmica is a fast-paced Action Roguelike, Bullet Heaven hybrid and rage bait simulator with RPG elements. Developed by CopyCat Game Studios, enter into a universe that delivers an intense and rewarding power trip, where players confront challenging enemies while embracing the chaos. The game cleverly satirizes gaming tropes, media tropes, and literally anything CopyCat can get their grubbly little paws on, letting players battle through exaggerated clichés with a mix of skill and strategy. Although the combat requires precision and quick thinking, each victory makes players feel like an unstoppable force, with the thrill of overcoming tough obstacles. The chaotic energy, combined with witty humor, creates an epic, adrenaline-pumping experience that’s both challenging and empowering.
2005480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
